title: Ukraine-Russia War Live Updates: Peace Talks in Istanbul Show Signs of Progress
content:
1. Ukraine-Russia War Live Updates: Peace Talks in Istanbul Show Signs of Progress  The New York Times
  2. Ukraine-Russia peace talks resume in Turkey  CBS News
  3. Russia says it will scale back near Kyiv as talks progress  Yahoo News
  4. Russia claims it will scale back military activity as part of Ukraine peace talks: LIVE UPDATES  Fox News
  5. Peace talks between Ukraine and Russia under way in Turkey - BBC News  BBC News
